subject: Cancel order. Chargeback
description_text:
Good evening,

I am emailing again in regards to my order SSN5616.

I have decided to cancel my order as I have had no response to my last
email. It is a shame as the pedals look good but if this is how customer
support will be I don't want to deal with this if I happened to have any
issues in future. I would like to add it has been 7 days since I placed the
order and only received a confirmation when I placed order and have had no
contact since.

I will also be canceling through Klarna as well to make sure I get my money
refunded in a timely manner.

It really is a shame your customer support is so bad as the products you
make look to be great from the reviews I have seen.

If I do not receive any contact by the end of the weekend regarding a
refund I will be doing a chargeback with my card as well so please sort
this quickly.

Kind regards,
Rufus

conversations.body_text: Hi Rufus Nesbit,  Hello, we sincerely apologize for not responding to your previous email in a timely manner. Due to a high volume of orders and emails during the peak season, our team experienced delays in processing messages. Please provide your order number, and we will assist you as soon as possible.

Hi,

Thank you for the response. I have seen that the pedals were dispatched
last week and are actually in the UK now. I'm guessing delivery will be in
the next day or so. I won't be proceeding with any cancellations as they
were dispatched the day after that email.

I would like to apologise for my previous email as I should of been a bit
more lenient given the time of year.

I am looking forward to receiving my pedals and testing them out.

Kind regards,
Rufus
Hi Rufus Nesbit,  Thank you for your understanding and support. If you have any questions or issues during use, please feel free to contact us at any time — we’ll handle it as soon as possible.
